categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Frog" was a language spoken by two members of a frog species, Frog Lady and her husband. It consisted of clicks and groans.

Frog first appeared in the Chapter 10: The Passenger, the second episode of the The Mandalorian Season Two. Though in the episode itself it is unclear whether "Frog" is the official name of the language or simply what Din Djarin nicknamed it, the subtitles used it as the name, confirming "Frog" is the proper term.
